lines.speaker: Kana
lines.dialogue: Psst! Hey! You with the port!

lines.speaker: Kana
lines.dialogue: Come on, there’s literally no one else here.
I turn to face the girl, hoping to get this over as quickly as possible

lines.speaker: Kana
lines.dialogue: Ah, great. I noticed that you uh… have that port on your head. Does it do what I think it does?

lines.speaker: Kana
lines.dialogue: I mean, you know… I heard it can do neat things. Can’t it transfer souls?

lines.speaker: Me
lines.dialogue: I have no idea what you're talking about.

lines.speaker: Kana
lines.dialogue: Oh come on, don’t try to pull that. You and I both know exactly what it does.

lines.speaker: Kana
lines.dialogue: I just want one small favor. Just one. I’ll give you plenty of scripts too.
I'm about to tell her to leave me alone when I look up at the new scroll
WANTED FOR INSUBORDINATION: KANA-0571. REWARD GRANTED ON RETURN, BODY OR SOUL

lines.speaker: Me
lines.dialogue: Alright, I'll give you a chance

lines.speaker: Kana
lines.dialogue: Thank you! Thank you so much!
